    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize(javafx.stage.Stage PrimaryStage,
                       Player p)
        Initialize and creates the window. Add title, icon to it and sets the size and align of the window. On close request calls the closeProgram function
        Parameters:
        PrimaryStage - gets the actual stage
        p - the player

      • Main_Menu

        public void Main_Menu()
        Draws the main menu's background and add 3 button to it. Sets the actions of the buttons.

      • load

        public void load()
        In case of load, it loads the players data from the 'farm_save' named file.

      • closeProgram

        public void closeProgram()
        It closes the program, and shuts down the javafx.

      • Setup_Game

        public javafx.scene.Scene Setup_Game()
        Draws the setup game menu, and add an observable list to it to set the difficulty of the game, a text field to write the players name and 2 button.
        Returns:
        Scene

      • Game_display

        public void Game_display()
        Calls the environment class to draw the ingame textures.
